meanings.meaning_en_US: A rectangular piece of stiff paper used for writing and mailing without an envelope.

examples.sentence: I bought a beautiful [postcard] from the beach.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我從海灘買了一張漂亮的明信片

examples.sentence: She sent me a [postcard] from her vacation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她從度假中寄給我一張明信片

examples.sentence: Collecting [postcards] can be a fun hobby.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 收集明信片可以是一個有趣的愛好

meanings.meaning_en_US: The possibility of suffering harm or injury.

examples.sentence: There is a real [danger] of flooding this season.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個季節有真正的洪水危險。

examples.sentence: He warned us about the [danger] of hiking alone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他警告我們獨自爬山的危險。

examples.sentence: Avoiding [danger] is essential for survival.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 避免危險對生存至關重要。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A distinctive attribute or aspect of something.

examples.sentence: The smartphone has several advanced [features].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這款智能手機有幾個先進的特徵。

examples.sentence: Her unique [features] make her stand out.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她獨特的特徵讓她脫穎而出。

examples.sentence: The new software includes a user-friendly [feature].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這款新軟體包含了一個使用者友好的特徵。

meanings.meaning_en_US: In the midst of or surrounded by something.

examples.sentence: She felt at home [among] her friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在朋友之中感到像在家裡。

examples.sentence: He was standing [among] the crowd.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他站在人群之中。

examples.sentence: This place is hidden [among] the trees.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個地方隱藏在樹木之中。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Careful thought, typically over a period.

examples.sentence: Safety is an important [consideration] in this project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 安全是本專案中的一個重要考量。

examples.sentence: She gave the matter much [consideration].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對此事給予了充分的考量。

examples.sentence: Financial [considerations] influenced their decision.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 財務考量影響了他們的決定。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Used we as the object of a verb or preposition to refer to the speaker and one or more other people.

examples.sentence: We need to believe in [ourselves].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們需要相信我們自己。

examples.sentence: Let's take care of [ourselves].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 讓我們照顧好自己。

examples.sentence: [Ourselves] are our own worst critics.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們自己是自己最嚴厲的批評者。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action or process of talking about something to reach a decision.

examples.sentence: The team had a [discussion] about strategy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 團隊討論了策略

examples.sentence: We’ll have a [discussion] after the presentation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 演講後我們會有一個討論

examples.sentence: The [discussion] was very productive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這次討論非常有成效

meanings.meaning_en_US: The earth, together with all of its countries, peoples, and natural features.

examples.sentence: The [world] is facing many challenges.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 世界正面臨許多挑戰。

examples.sentence: She traveled around the [world] last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她去年環遊了世界。

examples.sentence: He wants to make a difference in the [world].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他想在世界上有所作為。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A compulsory financial charge or levy imposed by a government.

examples.sentence: You need to pay your [tax] by April 15.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要在4月15日之前繳納稅款

examples.sentence: The income [tax] affects most workers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 所得稅影響到大多數工作者

examples.sentence: He's worried about the new [tax] laws.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對新的稅收法規感到擔憂

meanings.meaning_en_US: Waste material; refuse or litter.

examples.sentence: Please take out the [garbage].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把垃圾帶出去。

examples.sentence: The [garbage] was overflowing in the bin.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 垃圾桶裡的垃圾溢出了。

examples.sentence: He sorted the [garbage] for recycling.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他將垃圾分類以便回收。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who speaks, especially in public.

examples.sentence: The [speaker] addressed the audience passionately.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 演講者充滿熱情地對觀眾發言

examples.sentence: She is an experienced [speaker] on climate change.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是氣候變化方面的資深演講者

examples.sentence: The conference will feature a keynote [speaker].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議將邀請一位主題演講者

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to the running of a home or to family relations.

examples.sentence: The [domestic] issues were discussed at the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 會議上討論了家庭問題。

examples.sentence: She prefers [domestic] travel over international trips.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她更喜歡國內旅行而不是國際旅行。

examples.sentence: The [domestic] market is growing rapidly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 國內市場正在迅速增長。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A type of long, thin pasta.

examples.sentence: I love to eat [noodle] soup.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我喜歡吃麵條湯

examples.sentence: She made homemade [noodles] for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為晚餐做了自製的麵條

examples.sentence: They ordered [noodles] from the new restaurant.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們從新餐廳訂了麵條

meanings.meaning_en_US: The thin layer of tissue forming the complete covering of the body.

examples.sentence: Her [skin] is very smooth.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的皮膚非常光滑。

examples.sentence: Protect your [skin] from the sun.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 保護你的皮膚免受陽光照射。

examples.sentence: He has sensitive [skin].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他有敏感的皮膚。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A species of legume native to East Asia, widely grown for its edible bean.

examples.sentence: She added [soybean] oil to the salad.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在沙拉中加入了大豆油

examples.sentence: Tofu is made from [soybean].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 豆腐是用大豆製作的

examples.sentence: He prefers [soybean] milk over regular milk.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡大豆奶勝於牛奶

meanings.meaning_en_US: A question word used to ask about one or more items from a defined set.

examples.sentence: Do you know [which] book he prefers?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你知道他偏好哪本書嗎？

examples.sentence: I can't remember [which] way to go.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我記不起來該走哪條路

examples.sentence: She asked [which] dress to wear.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她問該穿哪條裙子

meanings.meaning_en_US: A drink consisting of carbonated water and flavoring.

examples.sentence: I would like a cold [soda] with my meal.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我想要一杯冰汽水搭配我的餐點

examples.sentence: He enjoys dark [soda] like cola.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡可樂這種深色的汽水

examples.sentence: She brings a [soda] to the picnic.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她帶來了一罐汽水去野餐

meanings.meaning_en_US: A building where people are kept as a punishment for a crime.

examples.sentence: He was sent to [prison] for committing theft.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 因為犯竊，他被送到監獄

examples.sentence: The [prison] was built in the 1800s.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這所監獄建於19世紀

examples.sentence: Life in [prison] can be very difficult.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 監獄生活可能非常艱難

meanings.meaning_en_US: A flat board or surface used for storing items.

examples.sentence: The books are on the top [shelf].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 書本在最上面的架子上。

examples.sentence: Please put the plates back on the [shelf].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把盤子放回架子上。

examples.sentence: She organized the [shelf] by genre.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她按類型整理了架子。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A track made of steel rails along which cars and trains run.

examples.sentence: The railroad connects several major cities.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這條鐵路連接幾個主要城市

examples.sentence: They built a new railroad last year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們去年建了一條新鐵路

examples.sentence: The railroad industry has seen significant changes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 鐵路行業經歷了重大變化
